thread.section_title: LilySilk Bedding Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LilySilk Bedding Store | lilysilk.com | 2 of 105
thread.title: Janice
thread.title_full: LilySilk Bedding Store reviewed by Janice

author: Janice
title: Janice
text: Lilysilk provided me with the perfect fitted sheet and extra pillow cases in a solid color to compliment the floral silk bedding I brought home from a recent trip to China. Samples were exactly the material and color of the items I bought within 5 days of contacting Lilysilk and my purchase arrived 3 days later. I have never slept in such luxury at such a reasonable price. Thank you, Lilysilk.
